mapper.sql: id, resourceCode, menuCode, resourceName, resourceUrl, resourceIcon, status, seqSort, description, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO k12system_resources ( resourceCode, menuCode, resourceName, resourceUrl, resourceIcon, status, seqSort, description, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{resourceCode}, #{menuCode}, #{resourceName}, #{resourceUrl}, #{resourceIcon}, #{status}, #{seqSort}, #{description}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE k12system_resources
resourceCode = #{resourceCode},
menuCode = #{menuCode},
resourceName = #{resourceName},
resourceUrl = #{resourceUrl},
resourceIcon = #{resourceIcon},
status = #{status},
seqSort = #{seqSort},
description = #{description},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE k12system_resources
resourceCode = #{map.resourceCode},
menuCode = #{map.menuCode},
resourceName = #{map.resourceName},
resourceUrl = #{map.resourceUrl},
resourceIcon = #{map.resourceIcon},
status = #{map.status},
seqSort = #{map.seqSort},
description = #{map.description},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k12system_resources ( resourceCode, menuCode, resourceName, resourceUrl, resourceIcon, status, seqSort, description, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{map.resourceCode}, #{map.menuCode}, #{map.resourceName}, #{map.resourceUrl}, #{map.resourceIcon}, #{map.status}, #{map.seqSort}, #{map.description}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM k12system_resources
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND resourceCode like CONCAT('%', #{resourceCode} , '%')
AND menuCode like CONCAT('%', #{menuCode} , '%')
AND resourceName like CONCAT('%', #{resourceName} , '%')
AND resourceUrl like CONCAT('%', #{resourceUrl} , '%')
AND resourceIcon like CONCAT('%', #{resourceIcon} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND seqSort like CONCAT('%', #{seqSort} , '%')
AND description like CONCAT('%', #{description} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
